website_summaries.verdict: Well-made and reasonably-priced, the trainer has become a new go-to workout shoe for many people. Most purchasers of the UA TR96 admit that they were initially attracted by the shoe’s appealing design. And they were not disappointed. The comfort, fit, and performance of this footwear make it an excellent value for the money.
pros: A vast majority of positive comments about the shoe mention its excellent fit
The TR96 is described as a very comfortable trainer by many purchasers
A significant number of people laud the stylish look of the footwear
Most gym-goers are satisfied with the support it offers for weight training and other exercises
More than a few wearers find the shoe to be well-constructed and made of quality materials
It feels light on the foot, according to multiple users
The buyers generally find the price point of the product to be reasonable
cons: People with wider foot dimensions warn that the trainer requires some breaking in

customer_reviews.title: Good value for gym
customer_reviews.text: I went one size up from normal shoe size, as per my older trainers of a different manufacture, to ensure width ok, which it is. Initially slight lack of flexure on heel support on the one shoe but after a few times of wear this has softened. So far find the pair to be comfortable and very suitable for the type of gym work I carry out
customer_reviews.author: OldBrock

customer_reviews.title: Good Trainers For The Gym
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as expected. Kept my feet secure for running on the treadmill and stable for doing barbell squats. A great inexpensive option.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: This pair of trainers fell apart very quick with minimal use... similar products (from the same brand) I previously bought, have lasted almost 3 times as long.
customer_reviews.author: DR T MADAS

customer_reviews.title: Use longer socks for the first few wears.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Only issue it hurt the back of my leg the first couple of times I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Muguimi

customer_reviews.title: Sizing needs care.
customer_reviews.text: Looks a good shoe, however it was very tight on the foot. Would need a larger size than normal.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN R CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers, ideal for gym workouts
customer_reviews.text: Good looking trainer, with good support. I have bought them for my circuit training class and they are great. Very light, and well made. I like the way they have been laced.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these to play football in and they still look like new
customer_reviews.author: Stef Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trainer
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough trainers. Been fine for walks and a few runs. Was worth it during the Prime Day deals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gym shoes not for running very comfortable and they give a good feeling of stability
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bourton

customer_reviews.title: very comfotable and hard wearing
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of trainers..fit perfectly and will buy again. Very well made. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: It felt like I was trying to fit my feet in to a size 8
customer_reviews.author: daniel fadera

customer_reviews.title: There shoes
customer_reviews.text: No issues, good looking shoes comfortable fit. For the price tag there decent vaule for money :) Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: craig thomas bolton

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Tr96 Fitness Shoes
feature_bullets: Breathable, lightweight mesh upper with synthetic overlays for lateral stability
Die-cut, full-length EVA sockliner moulds to the foot, eliminating slippage & providing ideal underfoot comfort
Material Composition: Upper: 53% Synthetic, 47% Textile, Outsole: 100% Rubber
EVA midsole provides excellent cushioning & a responsive feel
Isolated rubber pods strategically placed on the outsole to improve durability & flexibility
